fullplot: Lucy is a university student who is working a number of jobs. She volunteers at a research lab, works at a coffee shop, and as a photocopy clerk in an office. She responds to an advertisement and embarks on an erotic freelance job in which she is required to sleep in bed alongside paying customers.
plot: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.
title: Sleeping Beauty
